original_title: Marvin Gaye: The Real Thing - In Performance 1964-1981
overview: The definitive DVD collection of one of America's greatest stars. Issued with the full cooperation of the Marvin Gaye estate, this is the first official DVD anthology of classic archival television performances by a Motown artist. Features Marvin Gaye performing his biggest Motown hits, from "Hitch Hike" to "Let's Get It On" and more, in original classic clips from television and film.
title: Marvin Gaye: The Real Thing - In Performance 1964-1981
